info.title: Lead Generation Automation API
info.description: Multi-tenant lead processing and automation platform

post.description:
Authenticate user and return JWT token.

- **email**: User email address
- **password**: User password

Returns access token valid for 30 minutes.

get.description: Get current authenticated user information.

post.description:
Create a new user account (Admin only).

Creates a user within the same tenant as the admin creating it.

get.description:
Export leads to CSV or Excel format

- **format**: Export format (csv or xlsx)
- **fields**: Comma-separated list of fields (default: all fields)
- **Filters**: All standard lead filters apply
- **limit**: Maximum number of leads to export (default: no limit)

parameters.name: fields

schema.description: Comma-separated list of fields to export
schema.title: Fields

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to export

get.description:
Get list of available fields for export
Returns field keys and display names

post.description:
Preview CSV file before import.
Returns headers, sample rows, and validation results.

**Required Permission:** CREATE_LEADS (Admin + Reviewer)

Execute CSV import after validation.
Creates leads in database from valid rows.

**Required Permission:** CREATE_LEADS (Admin + Reviewer)

get.description: Get paginated list of leads with filtering and sorting.

post.description:
Create a new lead manually.

**Required Permission:** CREATE_LEADS (Admin + Reviewer)

get.description: Get list of unique sources for filtering.
Get single lead by ID.

put.description:
Update lead details.

**Required Permission:** EDIT_LEADS (Admin + Reviewer)

delete.description: Delete a lead. **Required Permission:** DELETE_LEADS (Admin only)

put.description:
Update lead status with Phase 1 workflow validation.

This endpoint:
1. Validates the new status exists in workflow
2. Updates the lead status
3. Logs activity (automatically via trigger)
4. Optionally adds a note

Assign lead to a user.

Validates:
- User exists and belongs to same tenant
- Logs assignment activity

post.description:
Update status for multiple leads at once.

Useful for batch operations in UI.

get.description:
Get complete timeline for a lead (activities + notes combined).

Returns a unified timeline sorted by timestamp.

post.description:
Manually enrich a lead with data from Clearbit.

**Required Permission:** EDIT_LEADS (Admin + Reviewer)
Bulk review multiple leads at once.

get.description: Get daily review statistics for current user.

Get all workflow statuses for current tenant.

Returns statuses ordered by display order.

schema.title: Response Get Workflow Statuses Api V1 Workflows Statuses Get

post.description:
Create a new workflow status for current tenant.

Only one status can be marked as initial per tenant.

get.description: Get a specific workflow status by ID.

delete.description:
Delete (soft delete) a workflow status.

Status is marked as inactive rather than deleted.

get.description: Get all workflow transitions for current tenant.

schema.title: Response Get Workflow Transitions Api V1 Workflows Transitions Get

post.description: Create a new workflow transition (allowed status change).

get.description: Get workflow summary for current tenant.

Get activity timeline for a lead.

Supports filtering by:
- activity_type: Filter by specific activity type
- user_id: Filter by user who performed the activity

post.description:
Log a custom activity on a lead.

Use for manual logging of calls, emails, meetings, etc.

get.description:
Get complete lead journey summary.

Provides high-level overview of lead's path through pipeline.

Get notes for a lead.

Notes are ordered by: pinned first, then by creation date (newest first)

post.description:
Add a note to a lead.

Also creates a 'note' activity in the activity timeline.

put.description: Update a lead note (content or pin status)

post.description: Pin a note (quick action)

Convert a lead.

This endpoint:
1. Creates a conversion record
2. Updates lead status to 'converted'
3. Sets conversion metadata on lead
4. Logs conversion activity

get.description:
Get list of conversions with filters.

Filters:
- days: Look back period
- converted_by: Filter by user who converted
- campaign_id: Filter by campaign
- min_value: Minimum conversion value

parameters.name: days

schema.description: Number of days to look back
schema.title: Days

parameters.description: Number of days to look back

get.description: Get a specific conversion by ID

Get comprehensive conversion report.

Includes:
- Overall metrics (total conversions, value, avg time)
- Metrics by user
- Metrics by source

Get conversion timeline (conversions over time).

Useful for charts showing conversion trends.

post.description:
Manually trigger pipeline processing for leads.

This endpoint allows testing the pipeline or processing specific leads.
In production, this will be automated by the scheduler.
Process a single lead through the pipeline.

schema.title: Response Process Single Lead Api V1 Pipeline Process  Lead Id  Post

get.description: Get current tenant's settings.

put.description: Update tenant settings. Requires admin role.

get.description: Get current user's preferences.
List all configured sources.

schema.title: Response List Sources Api V1 Settings Sources Get

post.description: Create a new source. Requires admin role.

put.description: Update a source. Requires admin role.

delete.description: Delete a source. Requires admin role.

get.description:
Get conversion funnel data showing lead progression through statuses.

Returns count and conversion rate for each status stage.
Get lead velocity over time - how many leads added per day/week/month.
Get performance metrics for each lead source.
Get current distribution of leads across statuses.
NEW: Advanced lead age analysis with detailed breakdowns.

NEW: Advanced conversion funnel with stage-to-stage conversion rates.
Different from pipeline funnel - focuses on conversion metrics.
NEW: Enhanced summary with period-over-period comparisons.
Analyze how long leads have been in the pipeline and in each status.
Get comprehensive analytics summary with key metrics.
Get dashboard statistics.
Get lead pipeline statistics.
Get recent activity feed.
Get AI-generated insights.
Get complete analytics for all 7 charts.

post.description:
Test connection to Instantly.ai API.

**Required Permission:** EXPORT_LEADS
**Roles:** Admin, Reviewer

schema.title: Response Test Connection Api V1 Instantly Test Connection Post

get.description:
Get list of campaigns from Instantly.ai.

**Required Permission:** EXPORT_LEADS
**Roles:** Admin, Reviewer

parameters.name: api_key

schema.description: Instantly.ai API key. If not provided, uses INSTANTLY_API_KEY from .env
schema.title: Api Key

parameters.description: Instantly.ai API key. If not provided, uses INSTANTLY_API_KEY from .env

schema.title: Response List Campaigns Api V1 Instantly Campaigns Get

post.description:
Export leads to Instantly.ai campaign.

**Required Permission:** EXPORT_LEADS
**Roles:** Admin, Reviewer

Note: This returns a background job ID. Poll /instantly/job/{job_id} for status.

get.description:
Get status of a background job (like lead import).

**Required Permission:** EXPORT_LEADS
**Roles:** Admin, Reviewer

Status values:
- pending: Job is processing
- completed: Job finished successfully
- failed: Job failed

Get analytics for a specific campaign.

**Required Permission:** EXPORT_LEADS
**Roles:** Admin, Reviewer

schema.title: Response Get Campaign Analytics Api V1 Instantly Campaign  Campaign Id  Analytics Get

post.description:
Pause a campaign.

**Required Permission:** EXPORT_LEADS
**Roles:** Admin, Reviewer

schema.title: Response Pause Campaign Api V1 Instantly Campaign  Campaign Id  Pause Post

post.description:
Activate a campaign.

**Required Permission:** EXPORT_LEADS
**Roles:** Admin, Reviewer

schema.title: Response Activate Campaign Api V1 Instantly Campaign  Campaign Id  Activate Post

get.description:
Get list of exported leads.

**Required Permission:** EXPORT_LEADS
**Roles:** Admin, Reviewer

schema.title: Response Get Exported Leads Api V1 Instantly Exported Leads Get

get.description: Get all connectors. Non-admins see only enabled ones without config.

schema.title: Response Get Connectors Api V1 Connectors Get

post.description: Create new connector (admin only).
Test connector connection (admin only).
Trigger connector sync (all users).

get.description: Get sync history for connector (all users).

schema.title: Response Get Connector Runs Api V1 Connectors  Connector Id  Runs Get

get.description: Get recent sync runs across all connectors (all users).

schema.title: Response Get All Runs Api V1 Connector Runs Get

post.description: Create ICP

get.description: List ICPs

schema.title: Response List Icps Api V1 Icps  Get

get.description: Get ICP stats
Get scoring rules

post.description: Create scoring rule

get.description: Get data sources

post.description: Test scoring

get.description: Get ICP details - THIS MUST BE AFTER SPECIFIC ROUTES

post.description: Create a new data source.

get.description: List all data sources for current tenant.

schema.title: Response List Data Sources Api V1 Data Sources  Get

get.description: Get data source details including configuration.

post.description:
Test connection to a data source without saving it.
Useful for validating configuration before creating.

Trigger a manual ingestion job.
Returns immediately and runs in background.
Trigger ingestion for a specific data source (simplified endpoint).

get.description: List ingestion jobs for current tenant.

schema.title: Response List Ingestion Jobs Api V1 Ingestion Jobs Get

get.description: Get details of a specific ingestion job.
Get ingestion statistics for current tenant.

List all public API templates.
Uses SQLAlchemy 2.0 async syntax with select().
Get single API template by ID

Debug endpoint to see raw template data.
Remove in production!
Health check endpoint.
Root endpoint.
